page.title: 10A DAY IN THE LIFE OF ROBERT1
page.content: On Saturday 11th May 1985 I watched "Street Hawk"on my Video.Then I had my breakfast, got dressed and tidied my room. At 10 o'clock I asked my dad if I could cut the lawns and he agreed. I got the mower out of the shed but while I was cutting the grass one of my friends called (Wayne) came to see if I was playing so he helped me to finish and then we went to his house and played on his BMX cycle. At about 1 o'clock mum,dad,Emma and myself went to Grimsby to do some ice skating. After we had been skating for an hour we went shopping. I bought a pocket torch and mum and dad bought a joystick and discs for our computer. When we returned home I went out on my bike for half_an_hour before tea.
